fields.description:
Android is missing a significant chunk of the Ti.Media APIs:
- appMusicPlayer
- audioPlaying
- audioSessionCategory
- availableCameraMediaTypes
- availablePhotoGalleryMediaTypes
- availablePhotoMediaTypes
- averageMicrophonePower
- cameraAuthorization
- currentRoute
- peakMicrophonePower
- systemMusicPlayer
- volume
- #beep()
- #hasMusicLibraryPermissions()
- #hasPhotoGalleryPermissions()
- #hideMusicLibrary()
- #isMediaTypeSupported()
- #openMusicLibrary()
- #queryMusicLibrary()
- #requestMusicLibraryPermissions()
- #requestPhotoGalleryPermissions()
- #setOverrideAudioRoute()
- #startMicrophoneMonitor()
- #stopMicrophoneMonitor()
- volume (output) event
fields.summary: Android: Parity of Ti.Media APIs is very low
